body.name: Anpviz 4K PTZ PoE Camera Outdoor with Pan 355° Tilt 90° 5X Optical Zoom, Human Vehicle Detection, 8MP Security IP Dome Camera with 160ft Smart Color Night Vision, Two Way Talk, SD Cars Slot (U Series)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 13 mins
features: 【8MP Resolution & 5X Optical Zoom/ 355°Pan / 90°Tilt】This 8MP (3840x2160) PTZ PoE camera outdoor with 5X optical zoom capabilities provides stunningly clear video, even when zoomed in. This PoE security camera outdoor equipped with horizontal 355° and vertical 90° can provide a all-around surveillance area without blind zone. (Note: Automatic tracking and cruise are not supported)

【Human/Vehicle Detection】To differentiate between humans, vehicles, and non-important objects in the scene, a red box surrounding humans and vehicles. When suspicious moving subjects like thieves/vehicles are detected, smart motion alert message will be instantly triggered on Free APP for notifying.

【160ft Smart Color Night Vision】At night, when the PoE PTZ camera detects person or vehicle, the LED white light will automatically turn on, and the video image will change from black and white to color. Three night vision modes to choose, smart color night vision, full color night vision all night, infrared night vision.

【2-Way Talk】This PoE ip camera built-in mic and speaker. You can talk with the visitors or your family on smart device in anywhere anywhen. You can also warn the unfriendly visitors via the speaker. (Note: The speaker only works with Anpviz U-Series NVR: B0BSNJQQXN and B0C4F8GTLS)

【 Metal Housing & IP66 Waterproof】The ptz poe camera is made of metal, IP66 Waterproof standard of our PTZ camera can withstand changeable environment, no matter in rainy day or severe weather for indoor or outdoor use. (Note: The ptz camera without an SD card slot)

productInformation.value: Easy to Install/5X Optical Zoom/Pan 355° Tilt 90°/Human Vehicle Detection/Two Way Talk/SD Cars Slot/Smart Color Night Vision See more

Previous page Next page 1 4K UHD Resolution 2 3 Mode Night Vision 3 Real-time Detection 4 Pan 355°& Tilt 90° 5 IP66 Weatherproof

Smart Dual Light No Motion(IR light on) When there is no movement of people and vehicles in the night monitoring field of view, the infrared light of the camera is turned on, and the image of the camera is black and white the same as the infrared night vision mode. Human/Vehicle Detected(Warm light on) When people and vehicles move in the night monitoring field of view, the camera turns on the warm LED light, and the image changes to color. (If you don't want the LED lights turn on, you can change samrt mode to IR mode)

Specifications of PTZIP3082W-SA-5X Resolution 8MP, 3840*2160@20fps Lens 2.7-13.5mm Zoom 5X Optical Zoom Focus Manual Focus, Doesnot Support Autofocus Micro SD Card Slot NOT SD Card Slot Video Compression H.265+/H.265/H.264 IR Technology 8pcs Array IR LEDs(80m IR Distance); 6pcs White Lights(50m Night Vision) Smart Detection Human Detection, Vehicle Detection, Motion Detection Movement Range Pan: 0°~355° Tilt: 0°~90° Audio Built-in Mic& Speaker Waterproof Rating IP66, IK10 Vandal Proof Power NVR, POE Switch or DC 12V2A, PoE+(802.3 at) 3 Night Vision Modes Smart Color Night Vision, Color Night Vision all Night, Infrared IR Night Vision to Choose Auto Tracking Cruise Not Supported Mobile APP Videolink
